head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: All Model Groups

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: All Model Groups

body.p: Saxon allows arbitrary values of minOccurs and maxOccurs on the particles of a model group using the compositor xs:all.
A complex type defined using xs:all may be derived by extension or restriction from another type using xs:all.
Element wildcards (xs:any) are allowed within xs:all content models.
